subject: Re: Update to Hair by Phd Website

full_threads.body: Logged 45mins to Harvest

Hi Sarkis,

Thanks for your time earlier. Confirming the requested changes have been completed: https://hairbyphd.com.au/

@chris All good on this one. 15mins has been added to the total.

@rica (Time: 45mins)

Hi @joel a few more tweaks here. 

1. Add location emails to the footer
info@hairbyphd.com.au
carlingford@hairbyphd.com.au
camden@hairbyphd.com.au

2a. https://hairbyphd.com.au/shop-gift-vouchers/ Buy a gift voucher for one of our locations
2b. Page layout to look like the https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online
3. Mobile home page: "Book Online" button added and hamburger moved to top right hand side
4. Desktop menu - remove deposits menu item in services (page can be archived and redirected to https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online/

Hi Sarkis, 

Thanks for the email. More than happy to jump on a call. Prior to, here is a summary email with exact links and instructions. 

1. https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online add the email address for each location to show below the location heading - Screenshot attached.
2. https://hairbyphd.com.au/deposit-cancellation-policy/ We have removed the gift voucher agreement and Carlingford address x2.
3. https://hairbyphd.com.au/shop-gift-vouchers/ is to look and function the same as https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online

Please let me know if that is correct and we'll action the outstanding updates.

Hi Chris,

Further to my previous email, the gift voucher page needs to have a location option then the same links used for online booking. Also we need to remove the deposit page. Give me a call tomorrow if you want to discuss these changes further.

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hi Chris,

Just a couple of changes.

Can you please add the email addresses to the contact details for each location below the booking page.

I sent you too much info in the doc for the Cancellation policy page. I don't need the Gift Voucher agreement in there and the Carlingford address. Please remove these and the gift voucher agreement in the heading.

Thanks Chris

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hi Sarkis, 

Great news, we have completed the updates, you can see them here: 
https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online/
https://hairbyphd.com.au/deposit-cancellation-policy/

Please review and let us know of any changes.
Logged 15mins to Harvest

@chris All good on this one. Should we turn off the woocommece?

@rica (Time: 15mins)

Hi @joel, Thanks! Client has approved the updates. Follow up tasks are: 

1. Apply the changes from page: https://hairbyphd.com.au/?page_id=12559&preview=true to page: https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online/

2. Add the following text to: https://hairbyphd.com.au/?page_id=12559&preview=true

Use our online booking system to book your appointment in advance. If you
can't see availability on the day you would like, give us a call or email
us as the appointment you're after may still be available or for any
potential cancellations. You can find our location contact details below.

3a. Remove page: https://hairbyphd.com.au/deposit/ and redirect to: https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online/
3b. Remove "deposits" from the main navigation

4. Remove "Square" payment gateway.

5. Update page: https://hairbyphd.com.au/deposit-cancellation-policy/ with the content found on the attached Word Doc (screenshot attached of the content).
Lets go book online.

Hi Sarkis, 

Sure thing! 

I like to keep things as short and punchy as possible. Book Now and Book Online are both simpler and more direct than "Request".

Please let me know your preference and we'll update accordingly.

Thanks Chris.

Looks good. Can you please add the speil I sent you. I will copy it again
below. Also can you please add our email addresses to the contact details
below. What do you think about changing the Booking Request button to Book
Now or Book Online?

*Use our online booking system to book your appointment in advance. If you
> can't see availability on the day you would like, give us a call or email
> us as the appointment you're after may still be available or for any
> potential cancellations. You can find our location contact details below.*
>

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hi Sarkis, 

Most welcome. No, please go through the PW reset process and let me know if you encounter any issues.

Thanks Chris.

Did you change the password for my login?

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hi Sarkis, 

Great news, we have completed the requested updates. 

The page is currently in draft mode, so you will need to log into the website WordPress dash. The page can be seen here: https://hairbyphd.com.au/?page_id=12559&preview=true

Once approved, we'll apply the changes to the live page and clean up the rest of the tasks (vouchers, payment gateway etc).
@chris Sure, All good on this one.

Hi @joel, looks great. Sorry, let's remove the maps as it will take up space on mobile view. 

Also bumping the click to call footer phone numbers. TY

@chris Let me know if this works for you?

https://hairbyphd.com.au/?page_id=12559&preview=true


(Time: 30mins)

Hi Chris,

What do you think about adding something like this on the Online Booking landing page?

Use our online booking system to book your appointment in advance. If you can't see availability on the day you would like, give us a call or email us as the appointment you're after may still be available or for any potential cancellations. You can find our location contact details below.

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hey @joel I need your help on this one please.

1. create a draft book online page: https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online-draft (suggested URL)

2. follow styling of the https://hairbyphd.com.au/contact/ page (example attached)

3. link each button to the corresponding booking link to open in a new tab
https://hairbyphd-camden.hwbw.link
https://hairbyphd-parramatta.hwbw.link
https://hairbyphd-carlingford.hwbw.link

4. make phone numbers the footer click to call.

Chris (Time: 15mins) to speak to client and prepare above.

Sounds good Chris.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Cheers,

Sarkis

Hi Sarkis, 

Thanks, please see below for notes/suggestions.

1. Booking links - The colour on Camden's link doesn't match the other 2 and is hard to read. I suggest changing it to black to match the others. https://hairbyphd-camden.hwbw.link
Here is the test I used: https://webaim.org/resources/contrastchecker/?fcolor=FFFFFF&bcolor=A1B5B5

2. Booking journey - We recommend changing the page https://hairbyphd.com.au/book-online/ to feature 3 buttons, one for each location. 

The page can be styled similar to what you see on a "contact" page with the visitor being directed to their preferred location. This streamlines the process and gets your visitor to the booking screen with fewer clicks and distractions. 

We'll loop back with an update for your as soon as possible.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio
